title: Tuman River
text: The Tuman River (; ) is a river in <a href="Kashgar%20Prefecture">Kashgar Prefecture</a>, <a href="Xinjiang">Xinjiang</a>, China. The name comes from the <a href="Uyghur%20language">Uyghur</a> word "tuman" () meaning "fog". The Tuman is a minor tributary of the <a href="Tarim%20Basin">Tarim Basin</a>. It is long and receives the water from of land. The <a href="oasis">oasis</a> city of <a href="Kashgar">Kashgar</a> is located on the Tuman's south bank.
